General.Name: Beijing Zhongkehaixun Digital S T
General.Description: Beijing Zhongkehaixun Digital S&T Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of anti-submarine warfare system equipment in China. It offers various underwater sonar system, acoustic data simulation, antisubmarine detection type unmanned combat deduction boat, and underwater unmanned submersible vehicle, as well as sonar signal processing system, multi-type sonar equipment, and other products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
